pages.title: Enforcement
pages.text: Moderators are responsible for clarifying and enforcing our standards of acceptable behavior and will take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any behavior that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

pages.title: Punishments
pages.text: $(li)Ban $(li)Kick $(li)Mute $(li)Temp Ban $(li)Temp Mute $(li)Ip-Ban $(li)Community Ban $(br2)A community ban is a complete ban in which you will be banned from any HexMC and PolyMC related community services.
